hymn.title: It's no longer I that liveth

layout.singingstanza: It's no long -- er I that liv -- eth, But Christ that liv -- eth in me. It's no long -- er I that liv -- eth, But Christ that liv -- eth in me. He lives, He lives, Je -- sus is a -- live in me! It's no long -- er I that liv -- eth, But Christ that liv -- eth in me.

lyrics.stanza: It's no longer I that liveth, But Christ that liveth in me. It's no longer I that liveth, But Christ that liveth in me. He lives, He lives, Jesus is alive in me! It's no longer I that liveth, But Christ that liveth in me.
